main event: A witness reported seeing a bright white object with an orange tail, identified as a fireball (meteor), for approximately 2-3 seconds.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on March 14, 1965, in Illinois,Ohio.,The object was observed visually from the ground.,The witness described the object as having an orange tail.,The object was classified as a meteor after analysis.,No photographs were included with the report.
sighted object: one bright white object with an orange tail
witness description: John Diet, who observed the object while driving.
